mapper.select: SELECT ${idBook} AS IDBOOK, ASF.FDRID, ASF.TIMESTAMP, ASF.FLD1, ASF.FLD2, ASF.FLD3, ASF.FLD4, ASF.FLD5, OFIC.NAME AS FLD5_TEXT, DIROFIC.ADDRESS AS FLD5_ADDRESS, DIROFIC.CITY AS FLD5_CITY, DIROFIC.ZIP AS FLD5_ZIP, DIROFIC.COUNTRY AS FLD5_COUNTRY, DIROFIC.TELEPHONE AS FLD5_TELEPHONE, DIROFIC.FAX AS FLD5_FAX, DIROFIC.EMAIL AS FLD5_EMAIL, ASF.FLD6, ASF.FLD7, NVL2 (ORG.NAME, CONCAT (CONCAT (ORG.CODE, '-'), ORG.NAME), '') AS FLD7_TEXT, ASF.FLD8, NVL2 (ORG2.NAME, CONCAT (CONCAT (ORG2.CODE, '-'), ORG2.NAME), '') AS FLD8_TEXT, ASF.FLD9, ASF.FLD10, ASF.FLD11, ASF.FLD12, NVL2 (CA.MATTER, CONCAT (CONCAT (CA.CODE, '-'), CA.MATTER), '') AS FLD12_TEXT, ASF.FLD13, ASF.FLD15, (SELECT EX14.TEXT FROM A${idBook}XF EX14 WHERE EX14.FDRID = ASF.FDRID AND EX14.FLDID=14 ) AS FLD14, (SELECT EX501.TEXT FROM A${idBook}XF EX501 WHERE EX501.FDRID = ASF.FDRID AND EX501.FLDID=501 ) AS FLD501, (SELECT EX502.TEXT FROM A${idBook}XF EX502 WHERE EX502.FDRID = ASF.FDRID AND EX502.FLDID=501 ) AS FLD502, ASF.FLD504, ASF.FLD505, ASF.FLD506 FROM A${idBook}SF ASF LEFT JOIN SCR_OFIC OFIC ON OFIC.ID = ASF.FLD5 LEFT JOIN SCR_DIROFIC DIROFIC ON DIROFIC.ID_OFIC = ASF.FLD5 LEFT JOIN SCR_ORGS ORG ON ORG.ID = ASF.FLD7 LEFT JOIN SCR_ORGS ORG2 ON ORG2.ID = ASF.FLD8 LEFT JOIN SCR_CA CA ON CA.ID = ASF.FLD12 WHERE ROWNUM <= #{maxReportRegisters} AND FDRID = #{fdrid}
